TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ResourcePool/TransactionEndDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

param.name: resource
param.span: Objeto que se pasa al delegado.

span.span: The object that is passed back to the delegate.

summary.span: Representa el método que controla el final de una transacción.

span.span: Represents the method that handles the ending of a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
